item.title: TryHackMe Crisis
item.description: Overview Room Name Crisis Dev @anir0y Tools required Wireshark Join Room Crisis Task 01: Introduction Download the File open with Wireshark 1.1 Download file. 1.2 When it all started? Open packet 1, layer 1 reavels the Time Stamp Enter Format (MMM DD, YYYY) 1.
